name: Buffalo Running Amidst Pyramids
description: Digital collage & barrier-grid animation made with photos from ca. 1870s/1880s by Antonio Beato & Eadweard Muybridge, found in the flickr commons archives. These were first made as sketches for barrier-grid animations to be projected through overhead projectors at a Live Animation Cinema stage production (sputnic.tv/en/projects/inferno/). Here they are reassembled in GIMP for #WorldArtDay2021 to support @creativecommons :: @annaxmalina :: annamalina.com
